/* eslint-disable prettier/prettier */ import { Button, Col, DatePicker, Form, Input, notification, Row, Select, Upload } from 'antd'; import FormData from 'form-data'; import TextArea from 'antd/lib/input/TextArea'; import { Option } from 'antd/lib/mentions'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { FormWrapperNoMargin } from './Style'; import { Cards } from '../../components/cards/frame/cards-frame'; import { PageHeader } from '../../components/page-headers/page-headers'; import { FormValidationWrap, HorizontalFormStyleWrap, VerticalFormStyleWrap } from '../forms/overview/Style'; import { Main } from '../styled'; import { getAdvertisementById } from '../../redux/advertisement/actionCreator'; const EditAdvertisement = () => { const { dataAds } = useSelector(state => state.Advertisement); const { adsId } = useParams(); const [form] = Form.useForm(); const { loading } = useSelector(state => state.Advertisement); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [click, setClick] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getAdvertisementById(adsId)); }, [dispatch, adsId, dataAds]); console.log(dataAds); return ( <> List Advertisement ]} />

adsId: {adsId}

{click === "Date" && <> } {click === "Impression" && } {click === "Click" && } false} className="sDash_upload-basic" accept="image/*" maxCount={1} > Select File Browse
